patterns: is hostel available for students in nnrg

The campus provides hostel facilities for girls but, unfortunately, does not offer the same for boys.

The hostel fee for a year amounts to Rs.90000

patterns: Tell me about IT in nnrg
responses: At nnrg, the Information Technology (IT) department offers a diverse curriculum covering key IT subjects such as programming, data structures, networks, and software engineering etc . With a focus on practical learning, the department provides well-equipped labs and a comprehensive library. Students often engage in industry-related events, benefiting from strong ties to IT companies for internships and placements.To know more about IT,you can visit nnrg IT&CSE

• Computer Science and Engineering
  • Data Science
  • CSE(Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
  • Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

The Mechanical Engineering department was established in 2009, with the prime motto to offer surreal education to the aspirants. The department offers both B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering and M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering for its students. The initial intake was 60, and the number has only increased in the later years, because of the unparalleled educational services provided by us.

NNRG is ranked among one of the best ECE colleges in Hyderabad because of its industry-oriented curriculum which is strictly as prescribed by UGC. The curriculum is up to date and follows the best teaching practices by highly qualified faculties.
The Department of Electrical & Electronics Engineering was started in the year 2009 with an intake of 60 in B.Tech Electrical and Electronics Engineering (EEE).

Civil engineering is a professional engineering discipline that deals with the design, construction, and maintenance of the physical and naturally built environment, including works like roads, bridges, canals, dams, and buildings.

patterns: Nalla Narshimha reddy group of institutions
responses:
Nalla Narshimha reddy group of institutions (nnrg) is a prestigious engineering college located in Korremula ‘X’ Road, Via Narapally, Chowdariguda (Vill), Ghatkesar (Mandal), Medchal (Dist), Hyderabad, Telangana , India.

nnrg offers a range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs and is known for its commitment to quality education and innovation.

For more information, you can visit the nnrg website: nnrg Website

nnrg's Achievements:

patterns: tell me about sports in nnrg
responses: Sports at nnrg are vibrant and diverse, encompassing traditional games like basketball, cricket, and football, as well as niche sports like badminton and table tennis. The college actively hosts inter-college tournaments and intra-college competitions, fostering teamwork and healthy competition. Students also have access to regional and national level events. For more infomation, you can visit nnrg SPORTS

patterns: tell me about the nnrg library
responses: nnrg boasts an extensive library offering a plethora of books, journals, and technical resources. With dedicated discussion rooms and a resource center, it provides an enriching environment for both individual study and collaborative learning.For more details, you can visit the library's website at nnrg Library

patterns: tell me about the labs in nnrg it
tell me about the labs in nnrg
responses: nnrg's Department of IT Infrastructure houses specialized labs equipped with cutting-edge technology. These labs support practical learning in programming, networking, and database management. They provide a hands-on environment for research, projects, and application of theoretical knowledge in real-world scenarios.For more information, you can visit nnrg LABS
